description: The chief prosecutor accuses the opposition's Coordination Council of trying to seize power.
title: Belarus opens criminal case against opposition leaders
title_page: Belarus opens criminal case against opposition leaders - BBC News
maintext: So the opening of this criminal case could pave the way for the arrest of many of those who remained. Appointed by Ms Tikhanovskaya, the Coordination Council members are a mix of artists, civil society figures, journalists and business people.
